enWisdom: Generosity bears the fruit of [spiritual] purity
Generosity earns love [of people] and adorns one’s character

Wisdom: السَّخَاءُ يُمَحِّصُ الذُّنُوبَ وَيَجْلِبُ مَحَبَّةَ الْقُلُوبِ
enWisdom: Generosity clears away sins and attracts the love of the hearts

Wisdom: جُودُ الرَّجُلِ يُحَبِّبُهُ إِلَى أَضْدَادِهِ وَبُخْلُهُ يُبَغِّضُهُ إِلَى أَوْلَادِهِ
enWisdom: The generosity of a man endears him to his rivals and his stinginess makes him hated by his [own] children

Wisdom: رِفْقُ الْمَرْءِ وَسَخَاؤُهُ يُحَبِّبُهُ إِلَى أَعْدَائِهِ
enWisdom: The gentleness of a person and his generosity endear him to his enemies
Generosity is the cause of adoration

Wisdom: عَلَيْكُمْ بِالسَّخَاءِ وَحُسْنِ الْخُلُقِ فَإِنَّهُمَا يَزِيدَانِ الرِّزْقَ وَيُوجِبَانِ الْمَحَبَّةَ
enWisdom: Espouse generosity and good etiquette for verily these two [traits] increase sustenance and bring about adoration

Wisdom: كَثْرَةُ السَّخَاءِ تُكْثِرُ الْأَوْلِيَاءَ وَتَسْتَصْلِحُ [يَسْتَنْصِحُ‏] الْأَعْدَاءَ
enWisdom: Abundance of generosity increases [one’s] friends and reforms [one’s] enemies

Wisdom: مَا اسْتُجْلِبَتِ الْمَحَبَّةُ بِمِثْلِ السَّخَاءِ وَالرِّفْقِ وَحُسْنِ الْخُلُقِ
enWisdom: Nothing brings about love like generosity, companionship and good character
